text: Ese igihe nticyari cyagera ngo imitima y’abemeye yicishe bugufi kubera kwibuka Allah n’ibyahishuwe by’ukuri (Qur’an)? No kugira ngo ntibabe nk’abahawe igitabo mbere yabo, nuko igihe (cyo gutegereza ibyo Intumwa zabasezeranyije) kikababana kirekire, maze imitima yabo ikinangira; kandi abenshi muri bo bari ibyigomeke
